articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: Sushant Singh Rajput & I had discussed a big project together last week: Producer Kamal Jain - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Chatting with Pinkvilla, Kamal Jain opened up on his equation with Sushant Singh Rajput and revealed that the late actor was always self-motivated and not depressed, and in his last call with him last week, they discussed a movie together. READ.

articles.title: In the Danny Masterson Rape Case, Echoes of a 2019 Lawsuit - The New York Times
